conclusion: Analyze the motion of particles A and B using their v-t graphs to determine when they meet.
The graph shows the velocity of particles A and B at different times.
The area under a v-t graph represents the displacement of the particle.
Calculate the displacement of Particle A from 0 to 2t0 as 2t0v0.
Calculate the displacement of Particle A from 2t0 to 4t0 as 4t0v0.
Calculate the displacement of Particle A from 4t0 to 6t0 as 2t0v0.
Total displacement of Particle A is 8t0v0.
Calculate the displacement of Particle B from 0 to 4t0 as 4t0v0.
Calculate the displacement of Particle B from 4t0 to 6t0 as t0v0.
Total displacement of Particle B is 5t0v0.
Set the total displacements of A and B equal to find when they meet.
At t = 4t0, displacement of A is 6t0v0 and B is 4t0v0.
At t = 5t0, displacement of A is 8t0v0 and B is 5t0v0.
